description: System-generated unique identifier for this fluid record.
Date and time the entry was recorded, in YYYYMMDDHHMMSSmmm format; used for sequencing and auditing.
Type of automotive fluid used or purchased for maintenance.
Monetary amount for the line item; likely unit price or total cost depending on quantity and unit—confirm with SME.
Number of units of fluid used or purchased, aligned with the specified unit of measure.
Enumerated code for the unit of measure applied to the quantity (e.g., gallon, liter).
Human-readable unit of measure corresponding to the code; likely a lookup value—confirm with SME.
Identifier for the corresponding record in the legacy system, used for lineage and cross-reference.
Legacy source table name from which the record originated.
